request.content:
Проверь мое эссе и дай рекомендации, как мне улучшить уровень владения языком.

Строго следуй формату результата:
- отрывок который можно улучшить;
- улучшенный вариант текста;
- твои пояснения на русском языке.

Текст эссе:
Imagine that you are doing a project on what music genres are popular among teenagers in Zetland. You have found some data on the subject – the results of the opinion polls (see the table below). Comment on the data in the table and give your opinion on the subject of the problem.
 

Music in an indispensable part of people’s life and has always been popular with teenagers. While working on a music project, I came across a table with statistics revealing the most popular music genres among Zetland teenagers. In my essay I am going to analyse the facts and give my thoughts. 
Overall, as it is shown in the table, the clear majority of teenagers living in Zetland prefer listening to pop music (55.4%) and electronic music with 55.3% of respondents who listen to this genre of music.  According to figures, the least preferred genre of music is classical music with 17.6% of youths who like such type of music. Furthermore, it is notable that a significant number of youngsters polled (49.2% and 27.2% respectively) are fans of R&B and rap and jazz. 
The number of teenagers who prefer these different types of music, on the other hand, varies substantially. Over 55 per cent of young people polled in Zetland tend to listen to pop music and electronic music, whereas only 17.6 per cent of teenagers in the same city like listening to classical music. The difference between the top and the bottom data in the provided table is about 37 percentage points. It is not surprising that pop music and electronic music are more popular, because there are a lot of popular singers on social media, whose music is usually energetic, exciting, and modern. Moreover, such music reflects the adolescents’ values and are close their lifestyle.
According to the research, young people are more likely to enjoy listening to modern singers and bands than to outstanding composers’ pieces of music. As a result, the younger generation might forget about classical music, which in its turn fosters a sense of beauty. There is, however, a remedy to this issue. Schools and colleges could introduce compulsory music clubs and discussions where students could learn the history of music, some facts about renowned composers and different stages of music development. Such lessons should be organised in an engaging and interesting way to draw students’ interest.
In conclusion, I believe that music is a vital part of teenagers’ lives. I believe that listening to quality music is an essential component of intellectual and emotional development. It improves our aesthetic feelings, broadens our horizons, and develops our creativity and imagination.

response:
Imagine if you were conducting a project on the popularity of music genres among teenagers in Zetland. You have come across some data in the form of opinion polls, and your task is to analyze the data and provide your opinion on the subject.

Music holds great significance in people's lives and has always been popular among teenagers. While working on a music project, I stumbled upon a table that presents statistics on the favorite music genres among Zetland teenagers. In this essay, I will analyze the facts presented in the table and provide my thoughts on the matter.

Overall, the table clearly indicates that the majority of teenagers in Zetland prefer listening to pop music (55.4%) and electronic music (55.3%). On the other hand, classical music is the least favored genre, with only 17.6% of youths expressing interest in it. Additionally, it is worth noting that a significant number of the surveyed youngsters (49.2% and 27.2% respectively) are fans of R&B, rap, and jazz.

The preference for different music genres among teenagers varies significantly. While over 55% of young people in Zetland enjoy pop and electronic music, only 17.6% of teenagers in the same city appreciate classical music. The difference between the highest and lowest data points in the table is approximately 37 percentage points. The popularity of pop and electronic music is not surprising, considering the presence of popular singers on social media platforms. Their music tends to be energetic, exciting, and modern, aligning with the values and lifestyle of adolescents.

According to the research, young people are more inclined towards contemporary singers and bands rather than the works of renowned composers. Consequently, the younger generation may overlook classical music, which plays a crucial role in fostering a sense of beauty. However, there is a potential solution to this issue. Schools and colleges could introduce mandatory music clubs and discussions where students can learn about the history of music, famous composers, and the different stages of its development. These lessons should be organized in an engaging and interesting manner in order to capture the students' interest.

In conclusion, I firmly believe that music is an integral part of teenagers' lives. Listening to quality music is a fundamental aspect of intellectual and emotional growth. It enhances our aesthetic sensibilities, broadens our horizons, and nurtures our creativity and imagination.
